entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
